settings.PREFIX_TOO_LONG: You can't have a prefix longer than {{length}} characters
settings.SET_SUGGESTIONS_CHANNEL_SUCCESS: Successfully set the suggestions channel to: {{channel}}
settings.MODLOG_CHANNEL_INVALID: {{modLogType, capitalise}} log channel was not a valid text channel, skipping
settings.REACTION_ROLES_NO_MORE_THAN: You have reached the limit of the amount of {{maxAmount}} reaction messages
settings.ALREADY_REACTION_ROLE_MESSAGE_WITH_NAME: There is already a reaction role message with that name
settings.REACTION_ROLE_MESSAGE_CREATE_SUCCESS: A reaction role message was created, you can now add roles to it
settings.REACTION_ROLE_MESSAGE_DOESNT_EXIST: That reaction role message doesn't exist
settings.ROLE_IS_HIGHER_THAN_MINE: The specified role is higher than mine, I won't be able to add it
settings.ROLE_IS_MANAGED: The specified role is managed, I won't be able to add it
settings.ROLE_ALREADY_IN_MESSAGE: The specified role is already included in that message
settings.TOO_MANY_ROLES_ON_MESSAGE: You can only have up to 25 roles on one message
settings.SUCCESSFULLY_ADDED_ROLE_TO_MESSAGE: Successfully added that role to the message
settings.SUCCESSFULLY_REMOVED_ROLE_FROM_MESSAGE: Successfully removed role from the message
settings.ROLE_NOT_IN_MESSAGE: The specified role is not included in that message
settings.FAILED_FETCHING_ROLE: Failed fetching role with ID `{{roleId}}, if you recently deleted a role, please remove it from the message, otherwise contact support
settings.CHANNEL_IS_NOT_TEXT: That channel isn't valid text channel
settings.FAILED_SENDING_REACTION_MESSAGE: Failed sending reaction message in channel
settings.FAILED_EDITING_REACTION_MESSAGE: Failed editing reaction message in channel

changelog.ERROR_DOWNLOADING: There was an unknown error downloading the changelog, please try again later.
changelog.NO_CHANGE_FOUND_POSITION: There wasn't a entry for position: {{position}}
changelog.MORE_DETAILED_CHANGELOG: More detailed changelogs can be found [here]({{url}})

help.VIEW_COMMAND_DOCS: You can view a full list of commands [here]({{url}})

poll.NO_ARGUMENTS_SPECIFIED: You need to specify what to make the poll about
poll.REACTION_ERROR: I was unable to react to the message, please ask an admin to check my permissions

shorten.NO_ARGUMENTS_SPECIFIED: You need to specify a URL to shorten
shorten.INVALID_URL: That isn't a valid URL! Did you miss out https?

snipe.SNIPE_TITLE: Messages edited/deleted in the last {{snipeLifetime}} seconds
snipe.EMBED_LIMIT_REACHED_BRIEF: Too many messages have been edited/deleted
snipe.NO_MESSAGES: No {{snipeType}} messages in the last {{snipeLifetime}} seconds
snipe.INVALID_SNIPE_TYPE: Snipe type must be either `edits` or `deletes`

suggest.NO_ARGUMENTS_SPECIFIED: You need to specify what to suggest
suggest.NO_SUGGESTION_CHANNEL: Suggestions haven't been setup on this server
suggest.ERROR_FINDING_CHANNEL: There was an error finding the suggestions channel
suggest.SUGGESTIONS_DISABLED: Suggestions have been disabled on this server

support.SUPPORT_DESCRIPTION: Use the links below to view the documentation or join our support server

image.NO_API_KEY: Image search hasn't been setup on this instance of the bot
image.POSITION_TOO_LOW: You cannot get a position less than one
image.NO_IMAGE_FOR_POSITION: There isn't an image for position: {{position}}
image.NO_IMAGE_FOUND: There wasn't an image for that search
image.NO_ARGUMENTS_SPECIFIED: You need to specify what to search for

addemoji.NO_ARGUMENTS_SPECIFIED: You need to specify a name for your emoji
addemoji.NO_ATTACHMENT: You need to attach the emoji to your message
addemoji.UNKNOWN_ERROR: There was an unknown error uploading your emoji, check the file size

mod.INVALID_USER: The user you provided was invalid
mod.BOT_ROLE_TOO_LOW: My role is lower than the target user's, ask an admin to move my role higher
mod.USER_ROLE_TOO_LOW: Your roles are lower than the target user's
mod.ACTION_SUCCESSFUL_WITH_DURATION: {{tag}} has been successfully {{action}} for {{duration, duration}}, with reason: {{reason}}

lookup.NO_ARGUMENTS_SPECIFIED: You need to specify a user/role to search for

move.ARGUMENTS_NOT_SPECIFIED: You need to specify two voice channels
move.AUDIT_REASON: Bulk moved members from {{fromChannel}} to {{toChannel}} Initiated by {{initiatedUserTag}}
move.CHANNELS_NOT_IN_GUILD: Both of the channels need to be in this server
move.NO_USERS_MOVED: There was no users to move

purge.DELETE_COUNT_TOO_LOW: You can't delete less than one message
purge.DELETE_COUNT_TOO_HIGH: You can't delete more than 100 messages
purge.NO_ARGUMENTS_SPECIFIED: You need to specify how many messages to delete
purge.DELETE_COUNT_INVALID: You need to specify a valid number

roles.ROLE_NOT_WHITELISTED: <@&{{role}}> is not whitelisted, you can't {{type}} that one
roles.UNKNOWN_ERROR: There was an unknown error managing that role, check with admin to see if I have the correct permissions
roles.USER_ALREADY_HAS_ROLE: You already have <@&{{role}}>, I can't add it again
roles.USER_DOESNT_HAVE_ROLE: You don't have <@&{{role}}>, I can't take something you don't have
roles.ROLE_HIGHER_THAN_ME: <@&{{role}}> is higher than my role, ask an admin to move my role higher

reactionRoleHandler.FAILED_FETCHING_ROLE: Failed fetching role `{{roleId}}`, ask an admin to check the role still exists
reactionRoleHandler.FAILED_FETCHING_MEMBER: Failed fetching member, if this issue persists please report it
reactionRoleHandler.FAILED_REMOVING_ROLE: Failed removing `{{roleName}}`, ask an admin to check my permissions
reactionRoleHandler.FAILED_ADDING_ROLE: Failed adding `{{roleName}}`, ask an admin to check my permissions
